game_description: Flap your hands and spread your arms to gracefully soar like a bird. You and your friends can fly circles around each with multiplayer and voice chat! Come in and see what all the fun is about.
review_1: i used to have a positive review, but ive changed my mind. the idea of the game is pretty good, use monke movement, and also fly. however, this is executed poorly its way to hard to learn, its buggy, and it is easily abused. anyways, next point. the toxic playerbase is genuinly annoying. its a bunch of jmancurly fans yelling slurs and teaching people how to escape the map. speaking of which, there is way to many children in this game, its not even funny. please add an "under 13" report option. finally, its not in the title, however the developer often responds to reviews, and they are obviously written by them. however, the dev is also kinda annoying, complaining that "one star is harsh." yes, we choose one star because we dont like it. the worst part? my original negative review got me BANNED from his game. how childish are you to get mad over a one star review in your cashgrab game??
review_2: Physics are bad Has a bad playerbase No moderators The owner will act hurt if you give a 1 star review
review_3: I will help make better places (maps) (skins) (options)
review_4: The games bad because of the lifeless toxic people in the game and if you add mod team it would be a better game thanks.
review_5: For the love of god, add an option to turn off voice chat. Having to mute every user individually is awful. I’d be happy to update my review once this is fixed. It’s a fun game but this is a deal breaker. Reviewer Reply: You can see that this is an issue by looking at the other low review scores, especially from those with young children. My advice, spend less time responding to reviews and more time adding mute functionality. Yes. An option to completely turn off voice chat. No rx, no tx, like most console and pc games. It’s possible to mute the mic systemwide, but not incoming voice. I’ll change my review to 5 stars as soon as this happens.
